expo.name: TurfWar.io
expo.description:
TurfWar.io is a GPS-based, global game of territory control. Use your daily capture tokens to take control of real locations or steal territory from the enemy team!
Each day you will receive 3 capture tokens, and each round ends at 12:00 PM EST every Friday!
Check out https://turfwar-io.herokuapp.com/

Fullstack Academy Stackathon project in January 2019
